entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Gagetown 1:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
